text: @GavinNewsom Please Governor Newsom could you Please ask the Mayor of Riverside to keep Face coverings mandatory!! I am high risk Medically for the coronavirus. I am afraid if people start to not wear face coverings illness and death will rise! I know you understand, please help! Thank you
